name: powerdelivery
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A deployment framework helping you to continuously deliver software to your customers using Microsoft Team Foundation Server and Windows PowerShell.
body:
PowerDelivery is a deployment framework that helps you [continuously deliver](http://continuousdelivery.com/) software to your customers using [Microsoft Team Foundation Server](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/vstudio/ff637362.aspx) and [Windows PowerShell](http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bb978526.aspx).

## At a glance
* [Background of the project](Background)
* [Diagram of release workflow](Workflow of powerdelivery releases)
* [Summary of continuous delivery](Summary of Continuous Delivery) with powerdelivery
* [What's included](What's Included)

## [Getting started](Getting started)
Get powerdelivery, configure TFS, and run the [Add Pipeline utility](Adding powerdelivery to a TFS project)

## [Writing builds](Writing builds)
Learn how to write the simple PowerShell script that delivers your products.

## [Triggering builds](Triggering builds)
How builds are run locally, or promoted through a delivery pipeline on Team Foundation Server.

### [PowerShell cmdlet reference](PowerShell cmdlet reference)
Commands you can use in your PowerShell script.
